title: How can I submit my abstract?
text: Go to your profile, upload, or write your abstract.

title: When will I get the abstract confirmation?
text: You will receive a confirmation email or notification on your profile.

title: How can I know if my abstract has been accepted?
text: After submitting your abstract, you will receive a notification confirming that it is under review by the congress scientific committee.

title: If my abstract is accepted as a poster, how can I know the exact dimensions?
text: The dimensions for the poster are 50 cm x 70 cm.

title: What is the language for the abstract submission?
text: All abstracts must be submitted in English using the online submission form on the website.

title: What is the structure for the abstract?
text:
- The title must be brief, concise, and in CAPITAL LETTERS.
- Authors: Please enter your name and your colleaguesâ€™ names as you wish them to appear in the Final Program.
- The abstract text should have a maximum of 200 words.

title: I have sent my abstract, but I want to make a modification; what should I do?
text: You must inform us one month in advance by using the abstract modification button in your profile.

title: How can I know the exact deadlines for abstract submission?
text: You will receive an email with all the required information and deadlines.

title: If my abstract is accepted, will I receive a certificate?
text: Yes, you will receive an abstract certificate after the congress ends, which will be sent to your email.

title: Can you please guide me on your website to do the required registration?
text: You can download the guides video [Link containing video].
